content.description: This Cowboys Hat is a gem tucked along a rarely visited cliff band just north of the east-west fenceline of the refuge north of Styx Canyon. Stand Start on an obvious set of jugs and dance up the overhung corner up and left busting very unusual moves for the Refuge - this is a lot like a set gym climb.
content.protection: While the FA did this without pads 1-2 pads is recommended and spotters should be mindful of the ledge behind.
content.location: This Cowboys Hat hides in a nice alcove in the southern Cliff band just WSW of Stetson Aretes which is just WNW of where the DMZ fenceline corner turns westward at Jurassic Park / 1000 Foot Canyon.

content.description:
This Cowboys Hat hides along a cliff band just a short hike west of Stetson Aretes which is WNW of the corner of the DMZ fenceline where the NS fence crosses 1000 Foot Canyon and Jurassic Park and turns west into EW fenceline.  

  If you’re on the south cliff of the large granite dome you will enter into a comfortable and shaded alcove with an overhung problem running up the left corner of the alcove.  

  Awesome moves and positioning, especially for the refuge.
